name: Gundam Robot
summary:
Gundam Robot has 2 parts: in game-A, you need to dodge flaming steel bars until the cockpit hatch opens.
In game-B, in a cockpit view, you move left and right and shoot down Zeon Mobile Suits.
The player also needs to blow up energy tanks to refill the energy for the beam rifle.
In the second round red mobile suits starts appearing with 3x speed.
